item.title: Greet the world in Python
item.description: Congratulations on making efforts of learning a new language. Python is relatively very easy to than the other programming languages. If you knwo English and logic, learning python will be a walk on a cake. Let’s get started with classic hello world program def greet(): print("Hello World")
item.content:
Congratulations on making efforts of learning a new language.

Python is relatively very easy to than the other programming languages. If you knwo English and logic, learning python will be a walk on a cake.

Let’s get started with classic hello world program

def greet():
    print("Hello World")
